Name: Cucumber Sake-Tini
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker.
Review: Subtle and dry. Cucumber and sake are made for each other.
History: Created in 2004 by Lisa Ball, London, England.
